A value of Partial generally means that the remainder will be sent in hard copy.

Any 2-digit number is valid.

For Direct Loan, this is the gross disbursement amount before the fee and interest rebate calculations are made. FFEL, the gross disbursement amount.

ReportedValueType.description: The value reported in the tag contained in the ResponseErrorField.

ResponseTypeCodeType.description: This code indicates a code used to specify the type of response.

LoanCounselingType.description: Logical grouping for Loan Couseling items.

ConfirmationIDType.description: Confirmation ID supplied from the counseling session.

CompletionDateType.description: The date on which the student's requirements for the degree were met or completed.

UniqueLayoutVendorCodeType.description: Code indicating the vendor that owns the unique field layout included.

UniqueLayoutIdentifierCodeType.description: Code identifying the unique fields layout included.

UserDefinedExtensionsType.description: Additional structured information. Requires mutually defined XML schema.

AcademicRecordBatchType.description: This is used to create a place holder and root element to contain multiple logical XML documents that are bundled for a single batch transmission.

AcknowledgmentCodeType.description: Enumerated values indicating if the document received was valid and will be processed.

SeverityCodeType.description: Enumerated values indicating the severity of the error and if processinf of the document was able to continue with errors (enumerated).

OtherAgencyType.description: The name of another agency that assigned AgencyAssignedID.

CanadianEthnicityCodeType.description: This is the ethnicity code as determined by Canadian schools

CanadianLegalStatusCodeType.description: The application for admission has a data element called LegalStatusCode which is child to CanadianEthnicityRace

TreatyCodeType.description: The applicant's declaration of determination of treaty status

StudentActivityGradeLevelType.description: Grade level of the applicant when they participated in the activity

YearMonthType.description: The year and month when an ordering of students in a cohort group was made.

StudentActivityRecognitionsType.description: Any recognitions earned as the result of participating in this activity.

LeadershipCharacteristicCodeType.description: The characteristic of the leadship position

AchievementTitleType.description: Name or Title of the achievement earned by the student

SponsorNameType.description: The sponsoring organization that made the award

StudentAchievementAwardYearType.description: The year in which the Student Achievement was received.

StudentAchievementAwardYearMonthType.description: The year and month in which the Student Achievement was received.

FirstDateAttendedType.description: The first date the applicant enrolled at this school

LastDateAttendedType.description: The last date the applicant enrolled at this school

ClassRankOtherType.description: This would allow for the class rank to be reported in some other way, such as Top Quartile, or Top Quintile, etc.

CollegeCreditEarnedBeforeHighSchoolGradu.description: An indication of types of college credit earned (or expected to be earned) by an applicant while in secondary school prior to high school graduation

AcademicAwardEarnedPriorToAdmissionCodeT.description: Describes the general level of a degree or diploma which a person expects to earn before the person enrolls at the postsecondary school.

CreditCardNumberLast4Type.description: The numeric identifier using the last for digits of the credit card number.

CreditCardExpirationDateType.description: The date the credit will expire or has expired.

NameOnCardType.description: The name as shown on the credit or debit card

OtherCollegeLocationType.description: Information about the location of the college to which the applicant has applied, or intends to apply

EarlyIndicatorCodeType.description: If this is an early application for admission, this can indicate the type of early action to be taken on the application

ApplicationWithdrawalIndicatorType.description: An indication that the student is requesting the application is to be withdrawn

FamilyEmployedCodeType.description: A code used to identify the family status of an employee of a family owned business.

JobDescriptionType.description: A description of the work performed

InstantMessageAddressType.description: The address to which the applicant may be sent an Instant Message (IM)

InstantMessageProviderNameType.description: The name of the provider of the IM messaging service by which the applicant may be sent an Instant Message (IM)

QuestionIDType.description: Survey question number or other identifier

QuestionAreaCodeType.description: General subject matter of the question

QuestionRequiredCodeType.description: Indicates if Student must answer the question

QuestionFormatCodeType.description: Indicates the presentation format of the question and answers

AllowedAnswerTextType.description: Repeated answers along with the answer selected by the student

AnswerSelectedCodeType.description: An indication that the student did or did not select this answer

FamilyDependentsNumberType.description: The number of dependents in a family.

PropertyPurchaseDateType.description: The date that the claimant purchased real property in the state

PublicAssistanceBeginDateType.description: The date that public assistance began.

PublicAssistanceEndDateType.description: The date that public assistance ended.

MilitaryDutyEndDateType.description: The date the claimant ceased serving on active duty in this branch of the military

ApplicationFeeAmountType.description: Amount of the application fee being paid or waived for the applicant

TextMessageAddressType.description: The address to which a text message may be sent to the applicant

I94PortOfEntryCodeType.description: The port where the non-citizen entered the US

TrainingSchoolNameType.description: The name of the training school.

TrainingLevelCodeType.description: A code the describes the how much training was completed.

VoterRegistrationNumberType.description: The voter registration number assigned to the claimant

AcademicTrainingStatusCodeType.description: The code used by SEVIS to identify the current status of the Academic Training

HomesteadExemptionClaimedCodeType.description: An indication that the claimant has been granted a homestead exemption by the state for the owned property

EmploymentEndYearMonthType.description: Date this employment ended or is scheduled to end

VehicleRegistrationOwnerNameType.description: A logical grouping of name information for a vehicle owner.

AcademicProgramCampusType.description: The preferred campus specified by the applicant for this particular program.

MaximumFamilyIncomeAmountType.description: The maximum of the range of income for the most recent year available for the applicant's family

MinimumFamilyIncomeAmountType.description: The minimum of the range of income for the most recent year available for the applicant's family

FamilyIncomeAmountType.description: Range of the income for aid purposes

IncomeType.description: This element provides a logical grouping of elements related to Income Data.

FullTimeFlagType.description: A flag to indicate if the claimant is or was a full-time or part-time employee

AcademicProgramPriorityType.description: The priority ranking for this program with relation to other programs requested in the application for admission (First, second, etc.)

PlannedEnrollmentStatusType.description: The anticipated enrollment level of the applicant

AcademicProgramDegreeLevelType.description: The level of the degree for which the applicant is applying

AcademicProgramDegreeLevelCodeType.description: A code to indicate the specific ranking of academic award for the person.

BasicHealthType.description: A logical grouping of health information.

EducationTestCodeType.description: Code identifying the test in the newer XML version of Test Codes

GenderCountType.description: A count of males and females, with an optional element for total count of both genders.

RaceGenderDistributionType.description: Indicates a population broken down by race and gender categories.

AgeGenderDistributionType.description: Indicates a population broken down by age and gender categories.

CountPercentageType.description: Indicates the count of items within a specific category, and the percentage that the count of items represents.

StudentFacultyRatioType.description: Indicates a ration of Student to Faculty in a format such as 25:1.

EnrollmentYearPeriodType.description: A code identifying the summer or regular school year.

OnlineCompletionAvailableIndicatorType.description: An indicator type specifying if the process may be completed online

CurrentSchoolIndicatorType.description: Listed school is the current or last school attended

ExitDateYearMonthType.description: The time that the student last attended the educational institution

NumberCoursesType.description: Number of courses that were taken in this subject area

CourseStatusCodeType.description: Status of this course. This field is required if CourseAcademicGrade is used.

AwardYearType.description: Year the achievement was earned or presented

AwardYearMonthType.description: Year and month the achievement was earned or presented

YearMonthBeginType.description: Month and year the applicant began participating

YearMonthEndType.description: Month and year the applicant stopped participating

SchoolOrganizationalControlType.description: Indicates the student's preference for Public or Private schools

NumericLowerBoundType.description: Indicates the minimum of the desired range.

NumericUpperBoundType.description: Indicates the maximum of the desired range.

SchoolAcademicLoadCodeType.description: Code reflecting if the student plans to attend full time

SchoolGenderCompostionCodeType.description: The male and female composition of the student body.

SchoolServicesType.description: Indicates the special services needed by the student

AdvancedPlacementCodeType.description: Identifies the course areas for which the student would like to obtain advanced placement.

FinancialAidSupportIndicatorType.description: A flag indicating if the student needs financial aid

WorkPlacementSupportIndicatorType.description: Indicates if the student needs help in finding a part-time job

EducationTestVersionType.description: A version label supplied by the test publisher. This changes when the structure of the test has changed (e.g, new subtest)

EducationTestGroupType.description: Provides additional grouping information for agencies that need to further identify a particular test.  The group will be agency specific.

TestAdministrationMethodCodeType.description: Provides information about alternate delivery forms of a test.

TestRegistrationNumberType.description: Provides an identifier for a specific student participating in a specific test administration session

ScoreExclusionReasonCodeType.description: Describes the reasons why no scores are present for this test

NonStandardizedConditionsCodeType.description: The test conditions that deviates from the standard test administration.

RawScoreValueType.description: Value expressed as a raw score. This is usually some form of the number of correct answers

PercentCorrectValueType.description: Score is expressed in terms of the percent of the total correct

ScaleScoreValueType.description: Value which is a  transformation of the raw score to common scale that can be used for comparison to other forms of the test

LabelValueType.description: Label describing a score value (e.g., Excellent).  The labels may or may not be ordinal

LocalValueType.description: Value that is not covered by other elements. This element allows both text and numbers.

MasteredIndicatorType.description: Signifies that the student has mastered (true) or not mastered (false) the tested domain

CutScoreType.description: Presents the score that needed to be equalled or exceeded to master the domain

NormPopulationCodeType.description: The group of individuals to which the student's score is compared.

NormPopulationDescriptionType.description: Text specifying the exact nature of the norm referenced population.

NormPopulationSizeType.description: The number of individuals that c.prise the norm referenced population.

RankValueType.description: Score expressed as a rank and the size of the population

PercentileLowerBoundValueType.description: Percent of examinees scoring below the current score

PercentileRankValueType.description: Number of examinees below the current score plus half the examinees at the same score divided by the number of examinees

PercentileUpperBoundValueType.description: Percent of examinies scoring at or below the current score (also called cummunlative percent)

StandardScoreValueType.description: Score expressed as a scaled derivative of a standard (z) score.

NormalCurveValueType.description: Score expressed as a percent of cases below this score assuming a normal distribution

StanineValueType.description: Value indicating the stanine (1-9) in which the score falls

EssayTextType.description: Actual text of the essay that is being scored (Used normally with computer based tests.)

PromptType.description: The question for the constructed response item.

AcademicPredictionCodeType.description: The measurement area that is to be measured

AcademicPredictionSubjectType.description: Indicates the subject area that is to be predicted or it indicates that the entire course of study is to be predicated

AcademicPredictionInterpretationType.description: A prose description of the meaning of the prediction values

AdvancedSubjectCreditCodeType.description: Course areas for advanced placement or credit.

CharacteristicValueType.description: Value of the selection factor if it is a single value or text

RealSSNCodeType.description: A code to indicate if the SSN is a Real or Pseudo SSN.

FileContentIDType.description: A submitter define description for the content of the file being transmitted.

FileTypeCodeType.description: A code to indicate the type of file being transmitted.

UpdatedLocationIDType.description: A value used to indicate the school location where the student enrollment should be certified.

ReportedDateType.description: The date an event was reported by the reporting agency.

EffectiveDateType.description: This the date when this address for the sending high school did or will become effective.

CourseInstructorType.description: The detailed information about the course instructor

EndorseType.description: Info of a Person who endorses a diploma, a program or a certificate

LearningTopicType.description: Topics to be taught for a course, learning experience or training

LearningOutcomeType.description: Program learning outcome and the outcome evaluations and alternative outcome mapping

LearningOutcomeDescriptionType.description: Text describing the outcome of a learning experience

LearningOutcomeSkillCodeType.description: Learning Outcome Skill based on DQP intellectual skills

AlternateOutcomeFrameworkType.description: A container to hold the alternative framework taxonomies that map to the learning outcome

FrameworkOutcomeType.description: information about the outcome of a learning activity

FrameworkOutcomeIdType.description: Program and course information for Learning Records
